metadata.name: Death Is Not The End רִאשׁוֹנָה
metadata.description:
When the machine stopped, I could see the sun for the first time, and I felt the rays on my skin. 

The light reached me through my eyes... after all these years, I felt my pulse again... 

the chains were broken and lay in the hot desert sand... 

I looked back and could see the shadows of the pyramid slowly approaching…

 they glided over the empty space... I kept walking forward... 

there was no map, because no one had ever been here before me... and yet, I trusted him... 

there was no going back.


Alec Empire


Alec Empire created the audio visual piece DEATH IS NOT THE END. 
________________________________________________________________  
There are two different unique 1/1 NFTs : The original & its shadow.

Unlock high res video file with this token - more infos on https://www.thvstudios.com
